mapper.select: select c.chptr_id as chptrId, c.name, c.length, c.regdate, c.doc, c.video, nvl(m.progress, 0) as progress, nvl(m.state, 0) as state from chapter c left join my_chapter m on c.chptr_id = m.chptr_id and m.user_id = #{userId} where c.lect_id = #{lectId} order by c.num asc

select m.user_id as stuId, c.chptr_id as chptrId, c.name as title, c.length as videoLength, c.video as videoUrl, c.num, nvl(m.progtime, 0) as progtime, nvl(m.progress, 0) as progress, nvl(m.state, 0) as state from chapter c left join my_chapter m on c.chptr_id = m.chptr_id and m.user_id = #{userId} where c.lect_id = #{lectId} order by c.num asc
